data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Kolhapur who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kolhapur that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Kolhapur unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Kolhapur.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bedar Kakamundi people.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 42,636 believers living in the county of Kolhapur. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India has a population of 3,876,000.

We estimate Kolhapur has 42,636 people who might know Jesus, 47,029 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,786,335 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
